head.title: Home - Fossil School District

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: Fossil Grade School Front with Swings

img.alt: Fossil Grade School Front with Swings

a.title: Wheeler High School Front of school

img.alt: Wheeler High School Front of school

div.p: The staff at Fossil School District would like to thank Mr. Brad Sperry for his ten years of service to our district and wish him good luck on his retirement. We will be posting a new message from our new superintendent Mr. Jim Smith as soon as possible.
The Yearbook/Newspaper class will be running a regular feature on news concerning your schools. The link to their online version is here.
